text:
You need not watch Name Me by Your Identify to see the friendship that has grown betweenand. (Though, it undoubtedly would not harm.)

The 2 co-stars play lovers within the Italian countryside, however in actual life, they’re simply two guys which have grown into nice pals.

Whereas on the pink carpet on the GQ Males of the Yr Get together, the actors informed E! Information’ Melanie Bromley that their friendship is “precisely” like their characters.

Armie, being the jokester, added, “Virtually precisely—besides we hate one another.”
title: Proof Armie Hammer and Timothée Chalamet's Offscreen Relationship Is Even Cuter Than Their Onscreen One
